ISSUE.TITLE: Ensure all GitHub actions are pinned
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Audit all GitHub actions and ensure that any remote actions are pinned to a specific version. ### Justification Mitigates breaking changes and safeguards against malicious actions.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #19351: Pin 3rd party GitHub actions to commit hash
Merge pull request #19352 from netbox-community/19351-pin-actions Closes #19351: Pin 3rd party GitHub actions to commit hash
